freesmartphone.org Framework DBus Interface Specification

org.freesmartphone.Network.Connection

Description

The Network Connection interface provides access to a network connection.

Namespace

org.freesmartphone.Network.Connection

Methods

  • StartConnection
  • StopConnection

Signals

None

Errors

None

Methods

StartConnection ( )

Description: Attempt to establish this connection.

StopConnection ( )

Description: Shutdown the connection.
